modName: Little Red Re-Done UNP No Wolf Version
summary: A do over of my previous follower that I decided to re-up versus just updating the file. HDT Vag is working now.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][size=3]
I could of just updated the previous file however, since this was a total redo I decided to re-up it. Fixed the HDT Vag and it's now working. Everything else is the same ENJOY!

Fairy tales in Skyrim? What the? Well we already have talking cat people, lizards and dragons so why not. 

[color=#00ffff][size=3]Years after Little Red Riding Hood had learned a valuable lesson and nearly lost her grandmother to a vicious wolf, she decided it was time for a change and  moved to Tamriel. Now 18 she also decided to learn combat skills so as to defend herself in case another wolf attack or in this case dragons, trolls you name it wanted to attack her. Little Red became a true warrior of skills by learning weapons combat, archery and magic. Note: You will have to download and apply the outfit on her if you want the themed version, otherwise you CAN of course dress her as you will. 
[/size][/color]
[color=#ff7700][size=3]LOCATION: Dead Man's Drink

STATS:
Age 18
Race: Breton
Armor: Naked
Weapons: 2 Glass daggers, a Nightinggale Bow with glass arrows.
Spells: Firebolt, Frostbite and Healing.
Health, MAgicka and Stamina: Set at 500
UNESSENTIAL 
Speed: 150
Height: .95, Weight .20
Skill Bonus's: Conjuration, Illusion, Restoration, Speech, Alchemy, Alteration and One Handed-Set at 100
Cute Red Riding Hood Outfit:[/size][/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67952/?]Gwelda (Little) Red Riding Hood Outfit UUNP - CBBE by Deserter X[/url]

[color=#00ffff][size=3]
INSTALLATION: Use NMM or manual to your taste's, UNINSTALL is same.

[/size][/color][color=#ff7700][size=3]RECOMMENDED: Amazing Follower Tweaks and or UFO (Ultimate Follower Overhaul).[/size][/color]

[color=#00ffff][size=3]CREDITS:[/size][/color]
